imdb.plot outline: Lovely Little Losers is a sequel to Nothing Much to Do and loosely based on William Shakespeare's Love's Labours Lost. Four flat mates live together under drastic self-imposed flat rules, while juggling their high school pasts and university lives.
imdb.title: Lovely Little Losers
plot: _Lovely Little Losers_ (qv) is a sequel to Nothing Much to Do and loosely based on William Shakespeare's Love's Labours Lost. Four flat mates live together under drastic self-imposed flat rules, while juggling their high school pasts and university lives.
